comment._content: He was a top-notch DJ  . . used to listen to him in the 1950s!

comment.author: 56077378@N06
comment._content: Harvey  passed away in Nov  2009. Just prior to that he was still on the Radio with his Passing Parade music show. He was in his 80s. My wife worked for him for a few years and had know him from their days at Neighborhood Theaters. Harvey graduated from JM sometime in the 40s and was in Eco of the JM Corps of Cadets. He was one of the nicest men you would ever want to meet.
